q1.question: Can I change plans later?
q1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

q2.question: Is there a free trial?
q2.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for all plans. No credit card required to start your trial.

q3.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q3.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and can also arrange for invoice payment for annual subscriptions.

q4.question: Do you offer discounts for annual billing?
q4.answer: Yes, you can save 15% by choosing annual billing instead of monthly billing.

q5.question: What kind of support is included?
q5.answer: All plans include email support. Professional and Enterprise plans include priority support with faster response times. Enterprise plans also include a dedicated account manager.
